name: com.mitay-walle.grid-raw-image
description:
Custom graphic for uGUI

Single-object/texture Grid image, excelent for tile-based inventory, with 
- extrude
- skip cells
- resize rectTransform to fit
- valid raycasting for input

samples.description: Contains scene with Grid Raw Image

author: mitay-walle <mitay-walle91@mail.ru> (https://github.com/mitay-walle)
